en.av_c1: The linked list before insertion. 15 is the value to be inserted.
en.av_c3: Copy current.element() as the new node's value.
en.av_c4: The next field of the new list node is assigned to point to what curr.next() points to.
en.av_c5: curr's next field is assigned to point to the new link node.
en.av_c6: The new link node is in its correct position in the list.
en.av_c7: The value of the current node is set to the value of "it", which is 15.
en.av_c9: Since a linked list has no size limit, insert always returns true
